nodes.bodyText: Not sure if you also want to update the name of the arg
nodes.diffHunk:

-                                                              .dynamoDbAsyncClient(dynamoDbAsyncClient)

nodes.bodyText: That was deliberate to show that we were actually passing in an async client.

nodes.bodyText: Is there a create method on VersionedRecordExtension if it can be done no-args?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -184,18 +206,20 @@ that write will fail.
 To load the extension:
 ```java
 MappedDatabase database = 
-  MappedDatabase.builder()
-                .dynamoDbClient(dynbamoDbClient)
-                .extendWith(VersionedRecordExtension.builder().build())
-                .build();
+  DynamoDbMappedDatabase.builder()
+                        .dynamoDbClient(dynbamoDbClient)
+                        .extendWith(VersionedRecordExtension.builder().build())

nodes.bodyText: There probably should be, but there isn't, so this is accurate. We plan to integrate that plugin into the core of the mapper anyway so it will be moot soon.
